front.title: Use of Composite ML-DSA in TLS 1.3

abstract.t: Compositing the post-quantum ML-DSA signature with traditional signature algorithms provides protection against potential breaks or critical bugs in ML-DSA or the ML-DSA implementation. This document specifies how such a composite signature can be formed using ML-DSA with RSA-PKCS#1 v1.5, RSA-PSS, ECDSA, Ed25519, and Ed448 to provide authentication in TLS 1.3.
